REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2585 reute r f BC-STERIVET-LABS-<STVTF> 03-23 0043

TEXT.TITLE: STERIVET LABS <STVTF> SETS STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Sterivet Laboratories Ltd said it authorized a three-for-one split of its common stock. The company said the stock split is subject to approval by its shareholders at its upcoming annual meeting. Reuter
